description: A token filter of type edgeNGram that builds N-characters substrings from text. Substrings are built from one side of a text.

properties.name: min_gram
properties.description: Sets the minimal number of characters in N-grams built.

properties.name: max_gram
properties.description: Sets the maximal number of characters in N-grams built.

properties.name: side
properties.description: Sets the text side from which N-grams are built.
